basic.floral_language:
Sedum morganianum
Floriography: kind, compact, beautiful.

S. morganianum is very close to S. sediforme but the leaves are much smaller than the latter and are light green.  Leaves are also covered by white powder and would turn into red when the sunlight is satisfied.

The plant requires sunny habitat. It will go through dormancy in summer and winter. It should be shaded and reduce watering. Blooms are rose red if flowered.
basic.blooming: Succulent plants, sometimes flowers, rose red flowers
basic.color: Leaf color light green, when sunny leaf color turning to pink

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, short period of dormancy in summer and winter, use half shade for better care
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil is dry, reduce water in dormancy
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions,  apply once monthly in spring and autumn, except in dormancy
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and rotten part timely
